name: VirtualKeypad
0:
”Alexa, turn on my living room lights.”
”Alexa, lock my front door.”
”Alexa, set my thermostat to 67 degrees.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Virtual Keypad Smart Home skill and Alexa, you can interact with your system's lights, thermostats, locks, and favorites with your voice. 

To start, first enable the skill and enter your Virtual Keypad email and password to link your account with Alexa. Alexa will automatically discover your panel's devices and favorites (called Scenes within Alexa). 

Some examples of what you can do are:

Favorites
- Alexa, turn on Outside Lights. (when "Outside Lights" is a Scene)
- Alexa, activate Sleep Time (when "Sleep Time" is a Scene)

Lights
- Alexa, turn on Kitchen Lights. (when "Kitchen Lights" is a light device)
- Alexa, turn off porch light. (when "Porch Light" is a light device)
- Alexa, set living rooms lights to 50%. (when "Living Room Lights" is a light device)

Locks
- Alexa, lock my front door. (when "Front Door" is a lock device)

Thermostats
- Alexa, set my home thermostat to 68 degrees. (when "Home Thermostat" is a thermostat device)
